inbound.choose:
<when condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("managementResponse") == null)">
                
                    @(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("managementUrl"))
                    GET
                    
                        application/json
                    
                    
                
                
                    
                        <cache-remove-value key="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("cacheKey"))" caching-type="prefer-external" />
                        
                            
                            @(
                                new JObject(
                                    new JProperty("fault", 
                                        new JObject(
                                                new JProperty("faultActor", "https://management.azure.com"),
                                                new JProperty("faultCode", ((IResponse)context.Variables["managementResponse"]).StatusCode),
                                                new JProperty("faultReason",((IResponse)context.Variables["managementResponse"]).StatusReason),
                                                new JProperty("faultCategory", "Error"),
                                                new JProperty("faultMessage", "Found no schemas in the Integration Account.")
                                        )
                                    )
                                ).ToString()
                            )
                        
                    
                    
                        <cache-remove-value key="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("cacheKey"))" caching-type="prefer-external" />
                        
                            
                            
                                application/json
                            
                            @{
                                        var additionalDetails = string.Empty;
                                        var internalFault = ((IResponse)context.Variables["managementResponse"]).Body.As();
                                        if (internalFault != null)
                                        {
                                            if (internalFault?["error"] != null)
                                            {
                                                additionalDetails = " Code: " + ((string)internalFault?["error"]?["code"] ?? "(unknown)") + ", Error: " + ((string)internalFault?["error"]?["message"] ?? "(unknown)");
                                            }
                                            else if (internalFault?["message"] != null)
                                            {
                                                 additionalDetails = " Code: " + ((string)internalFault?["code"] ?? "(unknown)") + ", Error: " + ((string)internalFault?["message"] ?? "(unknown)");
                                            }
                                        }

                                        return new JObject(
                                            new JProperty("fault", 
                                                new JObject(
                                                        new JProperty("faultActor", context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("managementUrl")),
                                                        new JProperty("faultCode", ((IResponse)context.Variables["managementResponse"]).StatusCode),
                                                        new JProperty("faultReason",((IResponse)context.Variables["managementResponse"]).StatusReason),
                                                        new JProperty("faultCategory", "Error"),
                                                        new JProperty("faultMessage", "An error occurred trying to get a list of schemas from the IntegrationAccount." + additionalDetails)
                                                )
                                            )
                                        ).ToString();
                            }
                        
                    
                    
                        <cache-store-value key="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("cacheKey"))" value="@((IResponse)context.Variables["managementResponse"])" duration="{{AIM-CacheTimeout}}" caching-type="prefer-external" />

choose.otherwise:
<set-variable name="schemaName" value="@{
                    JArray schemas = ((IResponse)context.Variables["managementResponse"]).Body.As()["value"] as JArray;
                    JToken schema = schemas.FirstOrDefault(a => ((string)a?["properties"]?["metadata"]?["messageType"]) == context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("messageType"));
                    if (schema != null)
                    {
                        return (string)schema?["name"];
                    }
                    else
                    {
                        return null;
                    }
                }" />
                
                    <when condition="@(string.IsNullOrEmpty(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("schemaName")))">
                        
                            
                            
                                application/json
                            
                            @(
                                        new JObject(
                                            new JProperty("fault", 
                                                new JObject(
                                                        new JProperty("faultActor", context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("managementUrl")),
                                                        new JProperty("faultCode", 500),
                                                        new JProperty("faultReason", "No Schema found"),
                                                        new JProperty("faultCategory", "Error"),
                                                        new JProperty("faultMessage", "Unable to find a Schema for MesageType " + context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("messageType") + ".")
                                                )
                                            )
                                        ).ToString()
                                )
                        
                    
                    
                        
                            
                            
                                application/json
                            
                            @(
                                        new JObject(
                                            new JProperty("schemaName", context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("schemaName"))
                                        ).ToString()
                                )
